channel.title: Posts on Naim's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Naim's Blog

item.title: Exploring the Wide Range of Projects Provided by abuse.ch
item.description: abuse.ch is providing community driven threat intelligence on cyber threats with a strong focus on malware and botnets. It is a collection of following projects: MalwareBazaar Link to heading MalwareBazaar is a place where your can get malware samples which is shared by malware researchers for infosec community. What it offers? Latest & Old malware samples. Feodo Tracker Link to heading Feodo Tracker is place where you can get latest malicious botnet C2 servers IP associated with Emotet, Dridex, TrickBot, QakBot and BazarLoader.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: As-salamu alaykum wa-rahmatu-llahi wa-barakatuh. This is my first blog. I’ll post here about my learning and thoughts. Hope you’ll find something useful here! üòÑ See you again friend. ‚ù§Ô∏è
